title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Park Home
body: From the Rio Grande to the Red River Valley  Come on a journey that will carry you through 300 years of Louisiana and Texas frontier settlement and development on a Spanish colonial "royal road" that originally extended to Mexico City, Mexico.              A Photographic Journey   You are about to travel 2,500 miles, from Mission San Juan Bautista Guerrero, Mexico to Fort St. Jean Baptiste Nachitoches Parish, Louisiana            Caddo Indian lifeways   Read the story of the Caddo people. As a self-sufficient nation with their own religion, the Caddo ignored Spanish demands.        Your Centennial on the Trail   Celebrate the centennial with us! We invite you to participate in trail experiences and events to learn, be inspired, or simply have fun!
